summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.3°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.9°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 633 m), light levels (up 2520 lux), and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1583 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 4565 lux) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 633.1m lower than yesterday, 531.9m lower than the past week, 1583.2m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1091.2m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and very little to no wind will be present. Chance of light rain, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and a mix of sun and clouds. Weather could become unsettled.
